Package com.vtrk.videotracker.API.Manager

Interface API_Manager

All Known Implementing Classes:
KitsuManager, TMDBManager
public interface API_Manager
API Manager interface
Purpose: to provide a common interface for all API classes Acts as a wrapper for API classes
